text: John Cameron Swayze (April 4, 1906 â€“ August 15, 1995) was an American news commentator and game show panelist during the 1940s and 1950s. He later became best known as a product spokesman. Swayne died on August 15, 1995 in Kansas, United States at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1995 deaths
title: John Cameron Swayze
